recipe.name: Six Layer Bars
recipe.preparation: Preheat oven to 350˚, (325˚ for glass dish).  Line a 13 x 9 inch baking pan with a sheet of foil, making sure to cover the sides well.   Place the butter in the baking pan and melt it in the oven.   Sprinkle crumbs over butter; pour condensed milk evenly on top of crumbs.  Top with remaining ingredients in order listed; press down firmly with fork.  Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned.  Cool.   Chill if desired.  Cut into bars.  Store covered at room  temperature.
